Chapter.Title: Practice Exercise 5-4: Displaying result returned by the fmod method
Chapter.Data: The fmod(x, y) method in the math class returns the remainder when x is divided by y, where x and y are floating point numbers. Using the fmod method, a statement to store the remainder when 15.5 is divided by 2 in the variable result1. Then display the value of this variable using the print function.
